Class Heap<E>

java.lang.Object
Heap<E>
Type Parameters:
E - Type of elements stored in this heap
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeapInterface<E>
public class Heap<E> extends Object implements HeapInterface<E>
A generic heap that stores elements in a a generic array.
